about_the_game:
Multiplayer Magic Brawler

Manaclysm is a PvP brawler where up to 60 mages wage war across realms fractured by magic.

Defeat Opponents, Earn Sparks

Obliterate other mages to earn Sparks. Spend them between rounds to enhance your spell arsenal, or max out your Mana and lay waste to the whole arena!

Counter-spell Combos

Each match features a unique set of spells - combine them in creative ways to counter your adversaries and emerge victorious.

Victory

Unleash spell storms, obliterate your opponents, and emerge victorious!

More Features:

  • 2 - 60 players per match. Invite friends to a private game, or hop into ranked matchmaking for some massive brawls!
  • Build a new mage with a custom arsenal of spells each match
  • Jump, portal, and fly around the arena while dodging a bullet-hell of arcane projectiles
  • Easy to pick up, hard to master gameplay
  • Features custom rollback netcode on dedicated servers. Another player's bad connection won't affect your latency
